message: I'm offering this product to you for $100. I want to assure you that I'm confident in its quality, but I'm willing to sell it to you for this price. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the sale.
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, and I'm not willing to pay $100 for something that might be worth $0 to me.

If you're still unsure, I can offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy for this product. If you buy it and don't like it, you can return it and get a full refund. This way, you can try it out without any risk.
I appreciate the return policy, but I'm still not willing to take the risk of buying a potentially low-quality product at $100. I'd rather wait and see if the next product is of higher quality.
